alert.note: Alert for Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 4:52PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Cochise County through 515 PM MST... At 450 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm along Highway 90 near Kartchner Caverns State Park, or 12 miles south of Benson, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts 40-50 mph with localized areas of blowing dust. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Whetstone, St. David and Kartchner Caverns State Park. This includes the following highways... Route 80 near mile marker 302. Route 82 between mile markers 49 and 58. Route 90 between mile markers 296 and 309. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson
